message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $2000000 to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
